LanguageData.BoatFishingDesc: Gather fish. Depth of water affects fishing chances.
LanguageData.DevModeShipsTooltip: Turn on DevMode to view the different options for debugging or fixing stuff with Boats
LanguageData.BeachGenMultiplierTooltip: Increase the amount of water on the coastline.
LanguageData.BeachGenMultiplierLargeTooltip: Current number is larger than recommended. The ocean can and may take up to as large as 80% of the map and larger maps will be scattered with lakes.
LanguageData.ForceSettlementCoastTooltip: Push nearby faction settlements to the coast if within given radius
LanguageData.DebugDraftAnyShipTooltip: Be able to draft and move any boat regardless of passengers. Useful if your boat gets stuck somewhere.
LanguageData.DebugDisablePathingTooltip: Disable boats using custom water based path finding, and instead use vanilla pathfinding. NOTE: Boats will travel like pawns
LanguageData.ShuffledCannonFireTooltip: Randomize the order in which broadside cannons fire.
LanguageData.RiverTravelAllowedTooltip: Allow boats to travel along rivers.
LanguageData.BoatSizeMattersOnRiversTooltip: Restrict boats to only be able to travel on rivers that are large enough to fit it. If disabled, all boats can travel on any river. If you bring a boat into a map with a river that cannot fit the size of the boat, you may end up beaching it.
LanguageData.FishingDelayTooltip: Base amount of ticks it takes to gather fish on a fishing boat.
LanguageData.FishingSkillTooltip: How much exp is given by fishing on a boat
LanguageData.FishingPersistsTooltip: The Fishing Boat fishing selection will not reset upon drafting.
